logicalColumns.name: Revenue Line Conversion Rate

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 0 THEN  NULL  ELSE 100.0d * %2 / %1 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line.# of Opportunity Revenue Lines
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line.# of Won Opportunity Revenue Lines

logicalColumns.name: Revenue Line Won Rate

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 0 THEN  NULL  ELSE 100.0d * %2 / %1 END

logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line.# of Won Opportunity Revenue Lines

logicalColumns.name: Revenue Line Loss Rate

logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line.# of Lost Opportunity Revenue Lines
